body.description: This is a vintage canvas messenger bag, perfect for working, short traveling,college and daily using. It has main compartments to carry 13.3 inch (or less) laptop, also has multiple pockets to keep your belongings organized. PRODUCT FEATURES: Made of Superior durable canvas, sturdy and durable. Sturdy and smoot zipper design which can keep your belongings well. Multiple compartments keep your belongings organized and at your fingertips. This Messenger bag is not only suitable for men but also for women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money!!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this. Everything is to my liking. Seems to be extremely well made and I love the color. Holds quite a bit of stuff and really like the length of the straps. Makes taking things into my class so much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for me. And lightweight. Great color and pocket location. So versatile!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and spacey
reviews.reviewText: Good material, good space, as pictured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works, love it
reviews.reviewText: I am a "senior citizen" who thought that a bag was for the younger set. I was encouraged by my son to get something like this since he found that it was very useful. I am happy I listened to him. The bag lets me put everything I need for my daily goings-on. I know where everything is, it being so handy, I do not have my pockets full of everything anymore. It looks like a man thing and at the same time something a woman could use. The canvas material looks strong. Only time will tell how durable it is. It does have enough pockets for all your stuff with an adequate-sized one for your cell phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my iPad Pro 12.9
reviews.reviewText: Great look and feel. Good price and it holds my iPad Pro 12.9 and all my cords, cables and folders with paperwork. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for my husband
reviews.reviewText: My husband is an avid reader and always has his hands full with stuff when going out the door. Gave this to him for Christmas and he uses it everyday and said he loves the bag and the size! Seems well made as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and Stylish!
reviews.reviewText: I travel often slip it over my shoulder and inside is my iPad,seat cushion for those bleacher like seats on cheap airlines! Everything you can imagine it will hold I love it it's like my American Express card I never leave home without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Casual Bag With Some Flaws
reviews.reviewText: A 3-star review almost seems too harsh for this bag, because I actually quite like it. It's stylish, lightweight, and has a ton of pockets. However, its flaws are a bit tough to overlook.For one, its pockets tend to be small and generally flush to the body of the bag. They have fairly low capacity, and anything that isn't slim and flat will create a large, noticeable bulge. I can put my laptop and two notebooks in there for carrying to class, but I can't put my laptop charger in without causing the bag to distend uncomfortably. Since the Velcro attachment points are on the two secondary pockets, it's hard to figure out what they'll accept. Several of the smaller zipper pockets won't even hold a handful of pencils without messing up the entire bag's ability to close.There's no shoulder cushion, so if you carry heavy books or a laptop, it can start to wear down on your neck/shoulder, especially if you walk around a lot. The strap also has a habit of becoming loose as you walk around, forcing you to re-tighten it frequently. Also, since the point of attachment between the strap and the bag isn't anchored down by anything other than a bit of fabric, the buckle will slip around and end up awkwardly sideways no matter how much you try to correct.Overall, however, this bag is alright for what it advertises as: a stylish messenger bag. It's definitely not a replacement for a backpack, even if your backpack is chronically under-filled. But if you're just going down the street with your laptop and a notebook, it's a nice pick.
Me gusto, llego a tiempo, justo lo que buscaba ya que no me gustan bolsos tan grandes y con solo llevar la laptop es mas que suficiente

reviews.reviewTitle: Bag is good, worth to money spent
reviews.reviewText: Good if the pockets inside are bit bigger, does not easily fit for a phone, other than that it is really good and use it every day.
Great bag. Very durable. Lots of pockets and great materials. Love the colour and the versatility of it. And easy to clean just toss it in the wash machine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto; idéntico a la imagen.
reviews.reviewText: En general cumple con lo indicado en la descripción. Solamente le falto mejor protección para el espacio de alojamiento de la laptop.
